Author: anonymous
Comment: I think urxvtc should probably be added (a lot of users use urxvtd and call terminal using `urxvtc`)

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: I’ve done this change in a slightly different way, so I’m marking this patch as superseded. Thanks :).

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: No, because urxvtc fails when urxvtd is not running. On some setups it may be installed even though people don’t start urxvtd. Using it would break the “open terminal” default keybinding.
